Title: Creates a private right of action for landlords and employers who suffer actual losses as a result of domestic violence
Summary: Creates a private right of action for landlords and employers who suffer actual losses as a result of domestic violence.
LawCode: Add ยง238-b, RP L; add ยง10-d, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the real property law and the labor law, in relation to creating a private right of action for landlords and employers who suffer actual losses as a result of domestic violence
